Your name really fits because you just used common sense, which is a landslide advantage against any "trans-rights" activist, to prove your point.

body:
Technically, something can be based and not true.
Based means "Independent and freethinking", but this post coincides with the current consensus of our very ignorant society, so it's not based even in the most fair respect.

Edit: It's also funny that every comment dissenting has at `least` 2 downvotes.  I thought downvoting was to show a post was low quality or off-topic, not just for lurking to attack the reputation points of those who disagree?
body_html:
Technically, something can be based and not true. Based means "Independent and freethinking", but this post coincides with the current consensus of our very ignorant society, so it's not based even in the most fair respect.

Edit: It's also funny that every comment dissenting has at least 2 downvotes. I thought downvoting was to show a post was low quality or off-topic, not just for lurking to attack the reputation points of those who disagree?

body:
Yapping badgering narcissists who have made their fetish into an identity and freak out if I or anyone else doesn't want to play their pretend fantasy game larp with them? Oh and they're diluting the concept of human rights by turning wants and desires into rights? Astronomical prostitution, std rates, gory castration surgeries, advocating for the sterilization of kids, a disproportionate amount of pedos. 

There is nothing about these people even remotely redeemable. They are the walking example that equal rights and social acceptance must always be seen as entirely separate concepts. They are why tolerance is a paradox. Fuck your dumb question.

There is nothing about these people even remotely redeemable. They are the walking example that equal rights and social acceptance must always be seen as entirely separate concepts. They are why tolerance is a paradox. Fuck your dumb question.

body:
A tranny that isnt a complete psycho is, in my experience, the exception not the rule. An edge case. Youre right about the suicide thing. I just want them to shut the fuck up and at least make a college try and behaving slightly acceptable and within societal norms. But they wont. 

So the bullying and overt rejection continues.

A tranny that isnt a complete psycho is, in my experience, the exception not the rule. An edge case. Youre right about the suicide thing. I just want them to shut the fuck up and at least make a college try and behaving slightly acceptable and within societal norms. But they wont.

So the bullying and overt rejection continues.

body: I personally don’t give a damn about how their insanity is being enabled to their own detriment in most cases. I do hate the trans activist who want to confuse the impressionable minds of young kids and try to make them think that being trans is a magical thing. Fuck them for taking advantage of the weak like that. In a properly developed society they would be getting professional and humane mental help rather than positions of influence. But that’s just how it is in this media landscape controlled by globalist, marxist scum.
